metadata.title: CVE-2018-7667 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Adminer through 4.3.1 has SSRF via the server parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adminer - 4.5.0-1
No subscription required

notes.note: ratliff> fake-sync from Debian for Trusty included only one of the two patches the rate limiting patch was not included, so I'm leaving this CVE open

criterions.comment: adminer package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-1').
